short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visual highlighting context from your Searches to find what you need fast on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For the visually impaired Browsly Search finds and highlights your answers clearing a website's clutter and distractions.

Important:

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Browsly Search extension and change my default search to Bing, the Privacy Policy, and the Terms of Use.

Privacy: https://browsly.co/privacy/

Browsly Search changes your default search engine to Bing for accessibility advantages which best enables Browsly Search to automatically find and highlight your search terms onto the following web pages you visit. From Bing search page you are then able to easily see highlighted search terms that were searched prior. Browsly Search is here to help visually impaired users search and easily find what they’re looking for without the distractions.

Stop wasting time trying to find what you are actually looking for in the search results and the websites you visit. Browsly Search automatically scans & highlights your defined queries. Just install the Browsly Search extension to automatically highlight your search queries in the web pages you visit from the search page. We’re making search more accessible for everyone. 

We’re continually working to improve Browsly Search and we’d love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out to us at accessbrowsing@gmail.com
